mapper.select: SELECT t.id, t.factory_code, f.`name` as factoryName, t.duty_date, t.duty_code, d.dict_value as dutyName, t.machine_code, d1.dict_value machineName, t.stock_bill_no, t.bill_no, t.grinding_weight, t.machine_weight, t.different_weight, t.create_by, u.user_name AS createByName, t.create_time, t.update_by, u1.user_name AS updateByName, t.update_time, t.remark FROM material_dosage t left join sys_factory f on f.code = t.factory_code left join sys_dict_data d on d.dict_code = t.duty_code and d.dict_type = 'duty' LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON u.user_login = t.create_by LEFT JOIN sys_user u1 ON u1.user_login = t.update_by LEFT JOIN sys_dict_data d1 ON d1.dict_code = t.machine_code and d1.dict_type = 'machine_code' where t.id = #{id}
